ThingDef.label: spring peeper egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized chorus frog egg. Spring peeper frogs are engineered to lay eggs more than once a day, but they are not as nutritious as most eggs. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: spring peeper egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized chorus frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a spring peeper tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: embittered bullfrog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized embittered bullfrog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: embittered bullfrog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized embittered bullfrog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into an embittered bullfrog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: tomato frog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized tomato frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. It tastes like ketchup.

ThingDef.label: tomato frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized tomato frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a tomato frog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked. Even when raw, it still takes like ketchup.

ThingDef.label: Grand Budgett's frog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Grand Budgett's frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Grand Budgett's frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Grand Budgett's frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Grand Budgett's frog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: tree frog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized bullet tree frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: bullet tree frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized bullet tree frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a bullet tree frog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: poison dart frog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized poison dart frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. Unlike the frogs themselves, consumption bares no elevated risk of food poisoning, let alone death.

ThingDef.label: poison dart frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized poison dart frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a poison dart frog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked. Unlike the frogs themselves, consumption of this egg and the poison dart frog within bares no elevated risk of food poisoning, let alone death.

ThingDef.label: Regenerative Toad egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Regenerative Toad egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Regenerative Toad egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Regenerative Toad egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Regenerative Toad tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Cyber Frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Cyber Frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Cyber Frog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Wood Pseudo-Frog seed
ThingDef.description: A Wood Pesudo-Frog seed. If all goes well, it should germinate into a Wood Pseudo-Frog seedling. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ingestible.foodType: Seed, Plant, VegetarianAnimal, VegetarianRoughAnimal, DendrovoreAnimal, Tree, Kibble

ThingDef.label: leviathan frog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized leviathan frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: leviathan frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized leviathan frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a leviathan frog tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Judas' frog egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Judas' frog egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Judas' frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Judas' frog egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Judas' frog nymph. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: fire-bellied toad egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized fire-bellied toad egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: fire-bellied toad egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized fire-bellied toad egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a fire-bellied toad tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: blood frog egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized engorged Frogglobin egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into an engorged Frogglobin tadpole. It is completely inedible.
